snippet.title: Glyph - Announcement Trailer [VR, Vive, Rift, Index]
snippet.description:
Announcement trailer for Glyph, a free-to-play virtual reality platformer where you control a ball-shaped mechanical scarab from a third-person perspective. The game is being developed by Bolvërk Games and will be released for HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Valve Index on December 2, 2019. You can find more information, as well as reviews and ratings here: https://vrgamecritic.com/game/glyph

► Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/vrgamecritic?sub_confirmation=1
► Like: https://www.facebook.com/vrgamecritic
► Follow: https://twitter.com/vrgamecritic
► Visit us at: https://vrgamecritic.com
